verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Silvanus <S%G4610><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Timothy <S%G5095><s%>, unto the church <S%G1577><s%> of the Thessalonians <S%G2331><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>;

Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the <S%G2257><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.

We are bound <S%G3784><s%> to give thanks <S%G2168><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, brethren <S%G80><s%>, even as <S%G2531><s%> it is <S%G2076><s%> meet <S%G514><s%>, for that <S%G3754><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> groweth exceedingly <S%G5232><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of each <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> one another <S%G240><s%> aboundeth <S%G4121><s%>;

so that <S%G5620><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> ourselves <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the churches <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> persecutions <S%G1375><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in the afflictions <S%G2347><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye endure <S%G430><s%>;

which is a manifest token <S%G1730><s%> of the righteous <S%G1342><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>; to the end that <S%G1519><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> may be counted worthy <S%G2661><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, for <S%G5228><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> ye <S%G3958><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%>:

if so be <S%G1512><s%> that it is righteous thing <S%G1342><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> to recompense <S%G467><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%> to them that afflict <S%G2346><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>,

and <S%G2532><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> that are afflicted <S%G2346><s%> rest <S%G425><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, at <S%G1722><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> from <S%G575><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> flaming <S%G5395><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%>,

rendering <S%G1325><s%> vengeance <S%G1557><s%> to them that know <S%G1492><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to them that obey <S%G5219><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%>:

who <S%G3748><s%> shall suffer punishment <S%G5099><s%>, even eternal <S%G166><s%> destruction <S%G3639><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the face <S%G4383><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> might <S%G2479><s%>,

when <S%G3752><s%> he shall come <S%G2064><s%> to be glorified <S%G1740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> saints <S%G40><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to be marvelled <S%G2296><s%> at in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them that believed <S%G4100><s%> (because <S%G3754><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> testimony <S%G3142><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> was believed <S%G4100><s%>) in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G1565><s%> day <S%G2250><s%>.

To which <S%G1519><s%> end we also <S%G2532><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> for <S%G4012><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> may count <S%G515><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> worthy <S%G515><s%> of <S%G2821><s%> your calling <S%G2821><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fulfil <S%G4137><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> desire of <S%G19><s%> goodness <S%G19><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every work <S%G2041><s%> of <S%G19><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%>, with <S%G1722><s%> power <S%G1411><s%>;

that <S%G3704><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> may be glorified <S%G1740><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, according to <S%G2596><s%> the grace <S%G5485><s%> of our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.
